item.title: Lenovo 100E Chromebook 81QB0000US - 11.6-inch ChromeOS Laptop
item.description: A rugged Chromebook suitable for students and lightweight computing, featuring an 11.6-inch HD display, MediaTek MT8173C processor, and a reliable eMMC storage solution.

item.title: Lenovo Chromebook 81JW0000US - 14-Inch FHD ChromeOS Laptop
item.description: Sleek and secure Chromebook ideal for everyday computing and multimedia with powerful performance features and effortless connectivity

item.title: Acer Chromebook CB315-3HT Full HD IPS Touchscreen Laptop
item.description: Acer Chromebook 315 2022 edition featuring a 15.6 inch Full HD touchscreen, power-efficient Intel Celeron processor, and Chrome OS designed for light productivity and media consumption.

item.title: Lenovo IdeaPad Chromebook - 14-inch Laptop for School & Work
item.description: Slim and portable Lenovo IdeaPad Chromebook designed for school and work with robust privacy features, high-quality display, and extended battery life.

item.title: HP Chromebook Plus 15a-nb0003ca - 15.6-inch ChromeOS Laptop
item.description: The HP Chromebook Plus 15.6 strikes a balance between affording an expansive screen size, sustainable design, smooth processing, and storage efficiency.

item.title: ASUS Chromebook CX1400CKA-DS84F - 14-inch Full HD ChromeOS Laptop
item.description: A compact Chromebook from ASUS featuring an Intel Celeron N4500 CPU, 8GB of RAM, and 64GB of flash memory storage.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy Chromebook Go - 14-inch Chrome Laptop
item.description: The Samsung Galaxy Chromebook Go is a lightweight and durable Chromebook designed for portability and productivity. Key features include 14-inch display, up to 12 hours battery life, military-grade design, and Wi-Fi 6.

item.title: Lenovo 100e Chromebook Gen 4 82W0001EUS - ChromeOS Laptop
item.description: The Lenovo 100e Chromebook Gen 4 is a compact and durable device suitable for educational purposes or light computing tasks.

item.title: HP Fortis G1m 11.6-inch Rugged Clamshell Chromebook
item.description: Rugged Chromebook for everyday use with 8 GB memory, an 11.6" HD screen, and durable build designed for school or work environments.

item.title: HP Fortis G1m Rugged Clamshell Chromebook B5JJ9UT#ABA
item.description: The HP Fortis G1m is a rugged 11.6" Chromebook designed for durability and efficient performance. Powered by an octa-core ARM Cortex processor and running Chrome OS, it meets the demands of basic multitasking and streaming.
